channel.title: AI for Business on Camilo Rojas
channel.description: Recent content in AI for Business on Camilo Rojas

item.title: The Evolution of AI Agent Development: From Complex Engineering to Accessible Tools
item.description: Exploring how AI agent development has evolved from requiring deep technical expertise to accessible no-code platforms, the emergence of domain-specific agents, and the critical role of industry standards in fostering innovation.

item.title: AI Agents: The Next Layer in Enterprise Architecture
item.description: AI Agents represent a fundamental shift in enterprise architecture, offering tool integration, memory persistence, and iterative reasoning. Based on hundreds of GenAI implementations, we explore two primary adoption patterns and their business impact.
